Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43788 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43788 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tensorboard is earlier than 2.16.2-3, affected by CVE-2024-43788
